title: Shampoo Bowl Head Rest
features: Reduce client’s neck fatigue and increase comfort during shampooing and rinsing.
Reduce client’s neck fatigue and increase comfort during shampooing and rinsing.
description: Head rest for SU-07, SU-60, SU-19 shampoo units. Customized for these units for a perfect fit. This black head rest cushion is made of a specially coated foam that makes it water-resistant and very easy to clean.
: Coated foam cushion for great comfort. Smooth exterior for easy clean and wiping down. Water resistant. Very durable. - All dimensions listed are approximations. Some assembly is required.
